data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Retro RPG SFX Pack
data.detailed_description:
This pack contains 207 sound effects for Retro RPG Attacks, UI Sounds, Magic, Movement, Jingles & more!

Features:

► Attacks (Magic Spells, Sword Slice, etc...)
► UI Sounds (Classic UI, Hover, Selection, etc...)
► Impacts (Damage, Hit Impact, Explosions, etc...)
► Musical Sounds (Buffs, Positive & Negative Jingles, etc...)
► Enemy Defeat, Item Collect & much more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
